fields.name: MultiLineString
fields.description:
MultiLineString Description with markup [defaultStart=+7days, multiLine=true, maxLength=22]
Example link to HTML Introduction

cases.name: HiddenCase
cases.description: This case should not be visible

cases.name: HiddenBaseCase
cases.description: This case uses a hidden base case

cases.name: Conditions.Base
cases.buildExpression: var value = PayrollValue["Conditions.Base"]; FieldAvailable("Conditions.BaseOption", value.HasValue && (int)value > 100); return true

cases.name: Conditions.Double
cases.validateExpression: var value = PayrollValue["Conditions.Double"]; if (value.HasValue && (int)value % 2 != 0) AddIssue("Conditions.Double", "Only odd values allowed");

cases.name: Conditions.SecondLevel
cases.description: Condition on second related case level: Conditions.Double > 100

cases.name: Allowance
cases.description: Monthly wage allowance [10% for wages greater than 5'000]

cases.name: SpecialAllowance
cases.description: Allowance of the monthly allowance [20% for allowance greater than 1'000]

cases.name: Toggle
cases.buildExpression: var toggle = GetValue<bool?>("Toggle"); FieldAvailable("ToggleReasonOn", toggle.HasValue && toggle == true); FieldAvailable("ToggleReasonOff",toggle.HasValue && toggle == false);

cases.name: CaseFieldDateTypeMonth
cases.defaultReason: Test Case Field Date Type Month

cases.name: CaseFieldDateTypeYear
cases.defaultReason: Test Case Field Date Type Year

cases.name: CaseFieldBuild
cases.buildExpression: var avail = FieldAvailable("TestCaseField.Optional"); InitValue("TestCaseField.Mandatory", avail ? 1 : -1); return true;

nameLocalizations.en: A very very long case name that does not want to stop

descriptionLocalizations.eb: A very very long case name that does not want to stop

fields.name: AVeryLongCaseFieldName
fields.description: A very long case field description

cases.name: OverrideInactive
cases.description: This case should not be selectable

caseRelations.validateExpression: bool valid = (int)TargetValue["Conditions.Double"] % (int)SourceValue["Conditions.Base"] == 0; if (!valid) AddIssue("Invalid target double value"); return valid

caseRelations.buildExpression: var baseValue = SourcePayrollValue["Conditions.Base"]; TargetFieldAvailable("Conditions.PositivePlus", (int)baseValue > 100); CopyEnd("Conditions.Base", "Conditions.Positive");  CopyStart("Conditions.Base", "Conditions.Positive"); return baseValue.HasValue && (int)baseValue > 0
